# Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)

## Reference

* Reference Number: cb-664-92280072
* Solicitation Number: 81002966
* Publication Date: 2024-04-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-15 18:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2027-04-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2037-03-31

## Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for the potential lease of office space that meets specific requirements.

## Description

The proposed space must be a minimum of 710.0 usable square meters (um2) and have 23 parking spaces. The property must be located within the city of Regina limits, outside of a specified boundary area. The lease term is approximately 10 years, commencing on or about April 1, 2027.

## Requirements

The proposed space must:

1. Be located in an office or commercial building, with a dedicated telecommunication/equipment room.
2. Have a minimum of 9.0 um2 for the equipment room.
3. Be contiguous and located on one floor.
4. Have a back door or secondary egress.
5. Be accessible to persons with disabilities.
6. Have electric vehicle charging stations.
7. Be located within walking distance (600 meters) of a public transit stop with a frequency of service of 30 minutes or less, Monday to Friday, 07:00 to 18:00 hours.
8. Have space for bicycle racks and after-hours cleaning.
9. Comply with PSPC's Standards for Leased Accommodation.

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Leon Lam
* Contact Email: [leon.lam@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:leon.lam@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (587) 338-3619
* Contact Fax: None

## Document

The EOI document is available for download on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). The document contains a map and text description of the geographic boundaries. In case of discrepancies, the text description shall prevail.
